title: LOOT-ICROUS
body: 3K OE - very classy, Riot; I'm impressed.

replies.body: Why was this one called "Double Cinderhulk"? (2x 1500?)

certainly 100x better than day 1 3 and 4's rewards combined.. Imagine going from 6.4k BE to 1 masterwork chest(of which can contain an emote.. For real they need to fix masterwork loot.. if u get anything thats not a 900 ~ RP skin, it should give u multiple.. 2 cheap skins 500~, 2-3 emotes etc.. 2-3 icons.. etc...) Thats really underwhelming and kind of a kick to the d*ck.. could've atleast gave us the rarer purple chest that has good loot. Also was QUITE Dissapointed to see the Bonus skin is an annie skin.. like we dont already have 11 of them.. :( I sound entitled, but still its the 10th anniversary lol, some of these seem a bit lazy.
Mine contained a chest which contained a chest which contained an emote.

Mine just gave me an emote. Which I was like yep.. Another great riot decision.. bc tbh if it was up to be, I think even regular chests should give u ATLEAST 2+ emotes.. They are literally like 200-300 rp and are worth dirt.. theres alot of them and they DO NOT equiv. to a skin or a chest in that matter.
I wish I had something to use it on. /owns all skin with 35k OE and counting.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qwqy1ZLA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-22T04:54:56.909+0000)
>
> I wish I had something to use it on. /owns all skin with 35k OE and counting.

*laugh* What are they going to give the man who has everything?

OE is about 10x more precious than BE; practically worth the same as RP. And "free" ("liquid") OE has been scarce in missions in this past year.
